osmactive 0.0.0.9000

    • Scottish Cycling by Design classification
    • Typologies of cycle infrastructure
    • Mapping, classifying, and integrating diverse street network datasets: new methods and open source tools for active travel planning

Function to get multilinestrings representing bus routes

Source: R/osmactive.R
get_bus_routes.Rd

It implements the query

Usage

get_bus_routes(
  place,
  query = "SELECT * FROM multilinestrings WHERE route == 'bus'",
  extra_tags = "route",
  ...
)

Arguments

place

A place name or a bounding box passed to osmextract::oe_get()

query

A query to be passed to osmextract::oe_get()

extra_tags

A vector of extra tags to be included in the OSM extract

...

Additional arguments passed to osmextract::oe_get()

Value

An sf object with the bus routes

Details

[out:json][timeout:25];
relation["route"="bus"]({{bbox}});
out geom;

See overpass-turbo.eu for an example of the query in action.

Examples

# r = get_bus_routes("Edinburgh")
r = get_bus_routes("Isle of Wight")
#> The input place was matched with: Isle of Wight
#> Downloading the OSM extract:
#>
